moderation.blacklist.add.success.message: Phrase added the to the blacklist!

moderation.blacklist.remove.404.message: That phrase is not in the blacklist.

moderation.caps.limit.set.message: Caps limit has been set to $1%

moderation.caps.trigger.set.message: Caps trigger limit has been set to $1%

moderation.cbenni.toggle.message: Cbenni link display for moderation has been $1.

moderation.cleanup.err.message: You can only delete 1 to 10000 messages.

moderation.cleanup.failed.message: Failed to perform bulk message deletion: Currently deleting messages.

moderation.cleanup.failed.err.message: Failed to perform bulk message deletion.

moderation.links.permit.time.set.message: Permit time has been set to $1 seconds!

moderation.logs.channel.set.message: Twitch moderation log announcements will now be made in channel #$1

moderation.logs.toggle.message: Twitch moderation logs have been $1. **[Requires bot restart]**

moderation.logs.toggle.usage.message: Usage: !moderation logs [toggle / channel] - Will toggle Twitch moderation logs being posted in Discord.

moderation.long.message.limit.set.message: Long message limit has been set to $1 characters!

moderation.spam.limit.set.message: Spam limit has been set to $1 messages!

moderation.usage.message: Usage: !moderation [links / caps / spam / blacklist / whitelist / cleanup / logs / togglecbenni]

moderation.whitelist.add.success.message: Phrase or username added the to the whitelist!

moderation.whitelist.remove.404.message: That phrase or username is not in the whitelist.

moderation.whitelist.remove.success.message: Phrase or username removed from the whitelist!
